price: 59. "(All) except the family of Lût (Lot). Them all we are surely going to save (from destruction).
arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: illā āla lūṭin innā lamunajjūhum ajmaʿīna
